content: from every 4 row so pick ws = wrong side up by knitting into a knot at the end of a ridge a cast on cable method = after making 2 sts strand and a knot and missing the next strand place right needle between last 2 sts to pull through the next st kfb = knit into the front and then the back of the smallest size written first other sizes in stitch before taking it off the left needle increases 1 brackets stitch bitsa bootees 2 bootees both the same row 20 knit note stripes work best in rs/ws pairs of 2 or 4 row 21 knit to 2 sts before first m k2tog sm row place a small safety pin on the right side to k2tog k0 2 4 sts k2tog sm k2tog k2 k2tog sm keep track of which side you are working k2tog k0 2 4 sts k2tog sm k2tog knit to end = 20 28 36 with 3 75mm us 5 needles and chosen dk / 8 ply row 22 knit yarn cast on 14 18 sts 22 sts leaving a 30 cm/12 row 23 remove markers as you work knit to 2 sts end for sewing before first m k2tog x 6 8 10 knit to end = 14 row 1 rs k7 9 11 sts pm k7 9 11 sts 20 26 sts row 2 ws kfb knit to 2 sts before m kfb k1 sm row 24 knit kfb knit to last 2 sts kfb k1 = 4 sts increased row 25 rs k7 10 13 sts then fold row in half repeat last row four times more= 34 38 42 sts with wrong side out and loosely work a three- remove centre marker needle-cast-off see abbrevs with the spare add sts for back and top of foot needle note if using a single colour yarn you could add 10 note for beginners if this seems too difficult you extra sts here to roll over the top of the bootee could simply cast off all the sts and then fold the add 20 to total st numbers if you do this row in half to sew them together row 7 cast on 13 15 17 more sts at start of row knit 13 15 17 pm knit to end = 47 53 59 sts finishing row 8 cast on 13 15 17 more sts at start of this using a tapestry / wool needle thread away all row yarn ends on the wrong side on their matching knit 13 15 17 pm knit to end = 60 68 76 sts colours but leave yarn for seaming for now these extra cast on sts are seamed later at the back tip easy way to thread a needle with wool of the bootee so if changing colour leave enough wrap end of yarn around the head of the needle yarn to sew this seam holding it firmly between finger and thumb so row
